entry.title: Android developer
entry.text:
#xamarin #вакансия #релокация #кипр #relocation #vacancy #cyprus
✔️Cyprus, Limassol
✔️Spotware Systems Ltd
✔️Relocation is a must after quarantine and borders opening
✔️Full-time
✔️4000-4500 Eur gross, 3100-3400 Eur net
✔️Fintech

Requirements:

BSc in Computer Science
Solid experience with unit testing
Minimum 3+ years’ experience working in C# Developer position
Deep knowledge in .NET and C#
Design patterns

Experience in following fields will be an advantage:

Experience with Xamarin.iOS or Xamarin.Android
MVVM client architecture, MvvmCross experience
S.O.L.I.D. principles of OOD
Experience with ReSharper/other refactoring tools
Test-driven development
Financial Instruments Trading /Trading Platforms development
Performance optimization

Bonuses: 

Relocation bonus
Health insurance
Vasa's support
Friendly working environment
Company events
Opportunities for personal growth

Contacts: telegram @katerina_fa
